class.name: org.n52.sos.ds.hibernate.entities.ereporting.EReportingStation
class.comment: Table to store the AQD e-Reporting Station information. Mapping file: mapping/ereporting/EReportingStation.hbm.xml

column.name: stationId
column.comment: Table primary key, used for relations

column.name: identifier
column.comment: The identifier of the station, gml:identifier. Used as parameter for queries. Optional but unique

column.name: codespace
column.comment: Relation/foreign key to the codespace table. Contains the gml:identifier codespace. Optional

column.name: name
column.comment: The name of the station, gml:name. Optional

column.name: codespaceName
column.comment: Relation/foreign key to the codespace table. Contains the gml:name codespace. Optional

column.name: description
column.comment: Description of the station, gml:description. Optional
